name: App4Home
0:
”Alexa, turn bedroom lights on”
”Alexa, make livingroom 100%”
”Alexa, dim lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you are able to control lights, switches, smart sockets, thermostats, with other types of devices coming to our platform every single day.
 This skill works with every account from App4Home platform. You can use Alexa to control every device from one place. No more installing one skill for every device manufacturer. 
 Alexa will assist you with managing your smart devices from App4Home platform. The setup is easy!
